item.title: 'We're trying to shame them': Upstart activist investors target America's underperforming banks
item.description: HoldCo has emerged from relative obscurity to launch activist investor campaigns against three regional banks: Comerica, Eastern Bank and First Inters...

item.title: PayPal shares surge 13% after OpenAI deal to become the first payments wallet in ChatGPT
item.description: The move makes PayPal an early part of OpenAI's efforts to broaden ChatGPT's use for e-commerce.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: PayPal, UnitedHealth, Wayfair, Skyworks, UPS and more
item.description: These are some of the stocks posting the largest moves in premarket trading.

item.title: BlackRock-linked tokenization firm Securitize to go public via SPAC deal
item.description: Founded in 2017, Securitize filed on Tuesday to go public through a SPAC deal that values its business at $1.25 billion.

item.title: HSBC to set aside $1.1 billion in third quarter for potential hit from Madoff case
item.description: Herald Fund SPC sued HSBC's Luxembourg unit in 2009, claiming restitution of securities and cash it said were lost in the fraud.
